title: ECOMMERS WEBSITE USING (REACT JS)
des: Lebaba E-Commerce Website is a modern, scalable platform built with React.js, Express.js, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS, offering fast performance, secure transactions, and a smooth shopping experience.

title: Dashboard
des: A responsive dashboard website built with React.js and Tailwind CSS, featuring clean and maintainable code. It displays products with images, prices, and quick view functionality, and includes dynamic, animated charts using Chart.js v4. Designed with a mobile-first approach and reusable components for scalability.
